name: thedailybeast
text: Derek Chauvin's bail was set at $1.25 million. The former officer was also ordered to not make contact with Floyd’s family and that he turn in all personal guns and permits and could no longer work in law enforcement or security in the future. https://t.co/1CVba4YPIL
